emailTagline: I’m not going to waste your time with a clunky form, reach me at my email or social media.

text.value: I’m the only one here, so you must be talking to me. Misplaced praises, flowery criticism, job offers, wacky ideas for collaboration, instructive videos on how to do a silly walk or information on the $200,000 that is waiting for me in the U.N and how I just need to give you $500 to get it.

I’m available to freelance in web development, data visualization and storytelling for you right now! Whether it is a personal project or a commission, I work on it with the same level of nuance and attention that I know the project deserves. Get in touch, maybe we can make something cool?
